    • restartClient

      public void restartClient(CONTROLLER controller, ClientRMI clientRMI) throws Exception
      This method allow the client to restart itself by giving the reference of the new clientRMI to the controller and the cli. The method also starts the client.
      Specified by:
      restartClient in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      controller - is the controller of the GUI.
      clientRMI - is the clientRMI to restart.
